advantages.name: Safe House
advantages.desc: Select between 1-3 dots, each point grows the size, security and privacy of your Safe House.

flaws.name: No Safe House
flaws.desc: Every morning you have to search for a new, safe place to await sunset.

advantages.name: Safe House: Hidden Armory
advantages.desc: Each dot you take adds another weapon stand to your home. A typical stand would be a long-rifle, a pistol and some ammunition.

advantages.name: Safe House: Panic Room
advantages.desc: Your house has a dedicated locked place to house tow individuals, it can also double as a jail cell.

advantages.name: Safe House: Watchmen
advantages.desc: For every dot your Safe House is guarded by an additional squad of 5, 4 average goons and a gifted boss.

advantages.name: Safe House: Laboratory
advantages.desc: Your Safe House is equipped with a modest lab. Each dot adds a die to science, technology or alchemical rolls performed within it.

advantages.name: Safe House: Luxury
advantages.desc: Your Safe House is beautifully decorated and outfitted. Gain two dice bonus to social tests within your Safe House. If you do not have 3 dots of resources, your decorations were gained illegally.

advantages.name: Safe House: Postern
advantages.desc: You have a secret escape route from your Safe House. Each dot adds an additional die to evasion or escapes near your Safe House.

advantages.name: Safe House: Security System
advantages.desc: Your Safe House has unusually good security systems in place. Each dot adds one die to resist or alert roles of unauthorized entry to your Safe House.

advantages.name: Safe House: Surgery
advantages.desc: Your Safe House contains a outfitted surgery bay. Each dot adds two relevant die to the dice pools.

flaws.name: Safe House: Compromised
flaws.desc: Your Safe House has been raided once before, it is likely known to your enemies. Add two dice to the pool of anyone trying to surveil or access your Safe House.

flaws.name: Safe House: Creepy
flaws.desc: You own the haunted mansion on the block. Your Safe House discomforts most who visit it. Any dice pools to seduce or put others at ease suffer a two-die penalty.

flaws.name: Safe House: Haunted
flaws.desc: Your Safe House is home to a supernatural manifestation that you don't control nor really understand. Work out with your ST what exactly is haunting your home.
